name: Danganronpa: Restrained Nature CHAPTER 1 DAILY LIFE
name_original: Danganronpa: Restrained Nature CHAPTER 1 DAILY LIFE
description:
After being thrown into Monokumas sadistic killing game, Yuna Kaigosha is set to unify all her new friends and escape together. But unfortunately, things don't go quiet as planned. But even so, Yuna, along with those who chose to side with her, will do anything they can to discover the truth of their imprisonment and escape. Will they be able to succeed before blood is spilled?

THIS FANGAME IS BASED ON SPIKE CHUNSOFT'S "DANGANRONPA" SERIES. ALL COPYRIGHTS BELONG TO SPIKE CHUNSOFT AND THIS GAME WILL NOT BE USED FOR ANY COMMERCIAL PURPOSES

This game may contain some scenes that may be disturbing for some people, so player discretion is advised

Some notes:

-the city's name in which Yuna and the other are being held captive has been changed to Doyle

-the free time events have been removed, but more character heavy scenes will be added in future chapters

-after everything was finished, I realized I haven't added even one Morning Announcements, only Night Announcements. For that I am sorry, and I'll be sure to add them in future chapters :)
